com.kolyadko.likeit.content

Class RequestContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kolyadko.likeit.content.RequestContent

  • public class RequestContent
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for request data (used to prevent HttpServletRequest journey through the app)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RequestContent(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Constructor which initializes RequestContent object with data from HttpServletRequest object It extracts request attributes, request parameters, session attributes, requestURI and set session invalidate flag as false
